pullrequest.title: More flexible build allowing for multi-version installation.

content.raw:
Thank you for the pull request! Side-by-side installation of different versions is definitely something interesting for this project. Sorry you didn't get any feedback for many months.

We're currently in the process of unifying our Cmake strategy for various repositories with the use of [ign-cmake](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake). I wonder if the intention is to use that for SDFormat too, which would overlap with the work on this pull request. Thoughts, @scpeters @mxgrey ?
